alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 12:18PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Lander and northwestern Eureka Counties through 1245 PM PDT... At 1217 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles northwest of Grass Valley, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Tenabo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
